snippet: A look at the results from the first round of exams linked to new learning standards show that the state has a long way to go in adequately educating students.
abstract: Editorial contends release of first round of scores in New York State from tests linked to the rigorous Common Core Learning standards show that state has a long way to go; urges candidate running for mayor of New York City to figure out how to advance school reform effort, using results from first round of tests as baseline to evaluate student progress.
lead_paragraph: A look at the results from the first round of exams linked to new learning standards show that the state has a long way to go in adequately educating students.

headline.main: New York’s Common Core Test Scores
headline.print_headline: New York’s Common Core Test Scores
